{% raw %}

class Card[source]

Card(suit=0, rank=2)

Represents a standard playing card.

Attributes: suit: integer 0-3 rank: integer 1-13

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
ten = Card(suit=0, rank=10)
jack = Card(suit=1, rank=11)
queen = Card(suit=2, rank=12)
king = Card(suit=3, rank=13)
ace = Card(suit=0, rank=1)
print(ten)
print(jack)
print(queen)
print(king)
print(ace)

10 of Clubs
Jack of Diamonds
Queen of Hearts
King of Spades
Ace of Clubs
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Deck[source]

Deck()

Represents a deck of cards. Attributes: cards: list of Card objects.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

Deck.add_card[source]

Deck.add_card(card)

Adds a card to the deck. card: Card

Deck.remove_card[source]

Deck.remove_card(card)

Removes a card from the deck or raises exception if it is not there.

card: Card

Deck.pop_card[source]

Deck.pop_card(i=-1)

Removes and returns a card from the deck. i: index of the card to pop; by default, pops the last card.

Deck.shuffle[source]

Deck.shuffle()

Shuffles the cards in this deck.

Deck.sort[source]

Deck.sort()

Sorts the cards in ascending order.

Deck.move_cards[source]

Deck.move_cards(hand, num)

Moves the given number of cards from the deck into the Hand. hand: destination Hand object num: integer number of cards to move

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Hand[source]

Hand(label='') :: Deck

Represents a hand of playing cards.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
